Parameters:
object - Object where extract filed value
fieldName - Field name
Returns:
Field value
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If field not found or security not let to access

isSubTypeOf

public static final boolean isSubTypeOf(java.lang.Class<?> testedClass,
                                        java.lang.Class<?> parentOrInterface)
Indicates if a class extends or implements directly or not a class or a interface

Parameters:
testedClass - Class tested
parentOrInterface - Class or interface to extends or implements
Returns:
true if the class extends or implements directly or not the class or interface

setFieldValue

public static void setFieldValue(java.lang.Object object,
                                 java.lang.String fieldName,
                                 java.lang.Object value)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
Change a field value of an object by reflection

Parameters:
object - Object to modify its field
fieldName - Filed name
value - New value
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If field not found, or security not let the modification, or the given value not compatible to the field
